ing: 1 (32 ounce) tube prepared white grits (polenta) (such as San Gennaro), crumbled
1/2 cup So DeliciousÂ® Dairy Free Original Coconut Milk
1 cup corn kernels, fresh or frozen (thawed)
1/2 cup minced fresh chives, plus more for garnish
1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained and chopped
des: "Super quick, these grits with corn kernels and fresh chives are topped with sun-dried tomatoes and avocado slices and served with your favorite hot sauce."
ins:
In saucepan, crumble tube of ready-to-heat grits, and heat over medium heat with 1/2  cup coconut milk until hot and creamy, about 5 minutes.
Add corn kernels. Continue cooking for another 5 minutes.
Add olive oil, salt, and chives and combine well before portioning into 4 bowls.
Garnish with sundried tomatoes, avocado slices, and the reserved chive.
Serve with your favorite hot sauce.
